verses.padam: (Padam) anumatyA̍ ityanu-matyai|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA-kapAlam|niriti̍|vapati|dhEnuḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|yE|pratya~jca̍ḥ|śamyA̍yAḥ|avaśIya̍nta̍ ityava̍ - śIyantE|tam|naiṛqRutamiti̍# naiḥ - Rutam|EkakapAlamityEka̍# - kapAlam|kRuṣṇam|vAsaḥ|kRuṣṇatU̍ṣamiti̍# kRuṣṇa-tUṣam|dakṣiṇA|vIti̍|ihi|svAhA̱|Ahu̍timityA-hutim|juṣAṇaḥ|Eṣaḥ|tE|niṛqRuta̍ iti# niḥ-RutE|BAgaḥ|BUtE̱|haviṣmatI|asi|mu~jca|imam|aṃha̍saḥ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|yaḥ|idam|cakAra̍|Adityam|carum|niriti̍|vapati|vara̍ḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA̍ - vaiṣṇavam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|vAmanaḥ|vahI|dakṣiṇA|agnIṣOmIyamitya̍gnI̍ - sOmIya̱m|1 (50)
verses.samhita: anumatyai̍ purOḍAśa-maṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ dhEnur dakṣiṇA̍ yE pratya~jcaḥ śaM~MyAyA̍ avaśIyantE̍ taM naiṛRuta-mEkakapAlaM̍ kRuṣṇaM ~MvAsaḥ̍ kRuṣṇatUṣaM̍ dakṣiṇA̍ vIhi svAhA&&hutiM̍ juṣAṇa Eṣa tE# niṛRutE BAgO BUtE# haviṣmatyasi̍ mu~jcEma-maṃhasaḥ̍ svAhA namO ya idaM cakArA&&dityaM̍ caruM nirvapati̍ varO dakṣiṇA&&gnAvaiṣṇava-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ ~MvAmanO vahI dakṣiṇA̍ &gnIṣOmIya - [ ] 1

verses.padam: (Padam) EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAlam|hira̍ṇyam|dakṣi̍ṇA|aindram|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|RuṣaBaḥ|vahI|dakṣiṇA|AgnEyam|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA-kapAlam|aindram|dadhi̍|RuṣaBaḥ|vahI|dakṣi̍ṇA|aindrAgnamityai̱ndra̍ -agnam|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ -kapAlam|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva - dEvam|carum|prathamaja iti# prathama - jaḥ|vathsaḥ|dakṣiṇA|saumyam|śyAmAkam|carum|vAsa̍ḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|sara̍svatyai|carum|sara̍svatE|carum|mithunau|gAvau̱|dakṣi̍ṇA||2̍ (34) (agnIṣOmIyaM-catustriṃśacca)(A1)̍
verses.samhita: mEkAdaśakapAlaṃq̍ hiraṇyaM̍ dakṣiṇaindra-mEkA̍daśakapAla-mRuṣaBO̍ vahI dakṣiṇA&&gnEya-maṣṭAka̍pAlamaindraM̍ daddhyRuṣaBO̍ vahI dakṣiṇaindrAgnaM̍ dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvaiśvadEvaM caruM prathamajO̍ vathsO dakṣiṇA̍ saumyaṅ śyAmAkaM̍ caruM ~MvAsO dakṣiṇA̍ sarasvatyai̍ caruṃ sarasvatE̍ caruM mithunau̍ gAvau dakṣiṇA||2̍ (agnIṣOmIyaM-catustriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) AgnEyam|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA-kapAlam|niriti̍|vapati|saumyam|carum|sAvitram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa-kapAlam|sArasvatam|carum|pauṣṇam|carum|mArutam|saptaka̍pAlamiti̍# sapta -kapAlam|vaiśvadEvImiti# vaiśva - dEvIm|AmikṣA̱m|dyAvApRuthivyamiti̍# dyAvA-pRuthivya̱m|EkakapAlamityEka̍-kapAlam||3̍ (18) (AgnEyaṃ saumyaM mAruta-maṣṭAda̍śa)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: AgnEyamaṣṭAkapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ saumyaM caruṃ sAvitraM-dvAda̍śakapAlaṃ̍ sArasvataM caruM pauṣṇaM caruM mArutaṃ̍ saptakapAlaM̍ ~MvaiśvadEvI-mAmikṣA̱M dyAvApRuthivya-mEka̍kapAlaM||3̍ (AgnEyaṃ saumyaM mAruta-maṣṭAda̍śa)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) aindrAgnamityai̱ndra - agnam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAlam|mArutIm|AmikṣA̱m|vAruṇIm|AmikṣA̱m|kAyam|Eka̍kapAlamityEka̍-kapAlaM|praGAsyA̍niti̍# pra-GAsyAn|havAmahE|maruta̍ḥ|yajñavA̍hasa̍ iti# yajña - vAhasaḥ|karaBEMṇa|sajOṣa̍sa̍ iti# sa - jOṣasaḥ||mO̍ iti|sviti̍|naḥ|indra|pRuthsviti̍# pRut-su|dEva|astu|sma|tE|śuṣminn|avayA||mahI|hi|asya|mIḍhuṣa̍ḥ|yavyA|haviṣma̍taḥ|maruta̍ḥ|vanda̍tE|gIḥ||yat|grAmE̱|yat|ara̍ṇyE|yat|saBAyA̱m|yat|indriyE||yat|śUdrE|yat|aryE̱|Ena̍ḥ|cakRuma|vayam||yat̍ ( )|Ekasya|adhIti̍|dharma̍ṇi|tasya̍|avayaja̍namitya̍va-yaja̍nam|asi|svAhA̱||akrann̍|karma̍|karmakRuta̍ iti# karma-kRutaḥ|saha|vAcA|mayOBuvEti̍# mayaḥ-BuvA||dEvEByaḥ|karma̍|kRutvA|asta̱m|prEti̍|ita|sudAnava̍ iti# su-dAnavaḥ||4 (70) (vayaM ~Myad-viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: aindrAgna-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ mArutI-mAmikṣA̱M ~MvAruṇI-mAmikṣA̱M kAyamEkakapAlaM̍ praGAsyAn.̍ havAmahE marutO# yajñavAhasaḥ̍ karaMBEṇa# sajOṣasaḥ||mO̍ ṣU ṇa# indra pRuthsu dEvAstu# sma tE śuṣminnavayA|mahI hyasya̍ mIḍhuṣO# yavyA|haviṣmatO̍ marutO vandatE̍ gIḥ||yad grAmE yadaraṇyE̍ yath saBAyAM ~MyadindriyE|yacCUdrE̍ yadarya# EnaścakRumA̍ vayaM|yadE ( ) kasyAdhi dharmaṇi̍ tasyAvayaja̍namasi̍ svAhA̱||akran karma# karmakRutaḥ̍ saha vAcA mayOBuvA|dEvEByaḥ̍ karma# kRutvA&staM prEta# sudAnavaḥ||4 (vayaM~Myad-viṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) agnayE̱|anIkavata̍ ityanIka̍ - vatE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA-kapAlam|niriti̍|vapati|sAkam|sUryE̍ṇa|udyatEtyu̍t̍ - yatA|marudBya iti# marut - Byaḥ|sAntapanEBya iti# sAM - tapanEByaḥ|maddhyandi̍nE|carum|marudBya̍ iti# marut-Byaḥ|gRuhamEdhiBya iti# gRuhamEdhi-Byaḥ|sarvAsAm|dugdhE|sAyam|carum|pUrṇA|darvi|parEti̍|pata|supUrṇEti̍ su - pUrṇA|punaḥ|Eti̍|pata||vasnA|iva|vIti̍|krIṇAvahai|iṣa̱m|Urja̱m|śatakratO̍ iti# śata-kratO||dEhi|mE|dadAmi|tE|nIti̍|mE|dhEhi|nIti̍|tE|dadhE||nihAramiti̍# ni-hAra̱m|it|nIti|mE|hara|nihAramiti̍# ni-hAra̱m|5 (50)
verses.samhita: agnayE&nIkavatE̍ purOḍAśa-maṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ sAkaṃ sUryEṇOdyatA̍ marudByaḥ̍ sAntapanEByO# maddhyandinE̍ caruM marudByO# gRuhamEdhiByaḥ sarvAsAM̍ dugdhE sAyaM caruM pUrṇA darvi̍ parApata̍ supU̱rṇA punarA pata|vasnEva̍ vi krIṇAvahA̍ iṣamUrjaṃ# śatakratO||dEhi mE dadAmi̍ tE ni mE# dhEhi ni tE# dadhE|nihAraminni mE# harA ni hAraM- [ ] 5

verses.padam: (Padam) nIti|harAmi|tE||marudBya̍ iti# marut - Byaḥ|krIḍiBya iti# krIḍi-Byaḥ|purOḍAśa̱m|saptakapAlamiti̍# sapta-kapAlam|niriti|vapati|sAkam|sUryE̍ṇa|udyatEtyu̍t̍ - yatA|AgnEyam|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA-kapAlam|niriti̍|vapati|saumyam|carum|sAvitram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa-kapAlam|sArasvatam|carum|pauṣṇam|carum|aindrAgnamityai̱ndra̍ - agnam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|aindram|carum|vaiśvakarmaṇamiti# vaiśva - kamarṇam||EkakapAlamityEka̍-kapAlam|6(30)̍ (harA nihAraM-triṃqśacca̍)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: ni harAmi̍ tE||marudByaḥ̍ krIḍiByaḥ̍ purOḍAśaṃ# saptakapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ sAkaṃ sUryEṇOdyatA&&gnEya-maṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ saumyaM caruṃ sAvitraM̍ dvAdaśakapAlaṃ̍ sArasvataM caruM pauṣṇaM carumai̱ndrAgna-mEkAdaśakapAla-maindraM̍ caruM ~Mvai̱śvakarmaṇa-mEkakapAlaM||6̍ (harA nihAraM-triṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) sOmAya|pitRumata̍ iti# pitRu - matE̱|purOḍAśa̱m|ṣaṭkapAlamiti̍ ṣaṭ - kapAlam|niriti|vapati|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|baṛqhiṣadBya iti# baṛhiṣad-Byaḥ|dhAnAḥ|pitRuBya iti# pitRu-Byaḥ|agniṣvAttEBya ityagni-svAttEBya̍ḥ|aBivAnyA̍yA̍ ityaBi-vAnyA̍yai|dugdhE|mantham|Etat|tE|tata|yE|ca|tvAm|anviti̍|Etat|tE|pitAmaha|prapitAmahEti̍# pra - pitAmaha|yE|ca|tvAm|anviti|atra̍|pitaraḥ|yathABAgamiti̍# yathA - BAgam|mandaddhvam|susadRuMśamiti# su - sadRuMśa̱m|tvA|vayam|maGavanniti̍ maGa-vann|mandiṣImahi̍||prEti̍|nUnam|pUrṇava̍ndhura̍ iti# pUrṇa - vandhuraḥ|stutaḥ|yAsi|vaśAn|anu̍||yOjA̱|nu|indra|tE|harI̍ iti||7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sOmAya̍ pitRumatE# purOḍAśaṃq ṣaṭkapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ pitRuByO# baṛhiṣadByO# dhAnAḥ pitRuByO̱&gniṣvAttEByO# &BivAnyAyai̍ dugdhE manthamEtat tE# tata yE ca tvA-manvEtat tE# pitAmaha prapitAmaha yE ca tvAmanvatra# pitarO yathABAgaM mandaddhvaṃ̍ susandRuśaM̍ tvA vayaM maGavan̍ mandiṣImahi|pranUnaM̍ pUrṇavandhuraḥ̍ stutO yAsi̍ vaśAṃq anu|yOjA̍ nvindra̍ tE harI̱||7

verses.padam: (Padam) akṣann|amI̍madanta|hi|avEti̍|priyAḥ|adhUṣata||astO̍ṣata|svaBA̍nava̍ iti sva-BAnavaḥ|viprA̱ḥ|naviṣṭhayA|matI||yOjA̱|nu|indra|tE|harI̍ iti||akṣann̍|pitara̍ḥ|amI̍madanta|pitara̍ḥ||atI̍tRupanta|pitara̍ḥ|amI̍mRujanta|pitara̍ḥ|parEti̍|ita|pitaraḥ|sOmyAḥ|gaBIMqraiḥ|pathiBiriti̍# pathi-Biḥ|pUrvyaiḥ||atha|pitRUn|suvidatrAniti̍# su - vidatrAn|apIti̍|ita|yamEna̍|yE|sadhamAdamiti̍# sadha - mAda̱m|madanti||mana̍ḥ|nu|Eti̍|huvAmahE|nArAśaṃqsEna̍|stOmE̍na|pitRuṇAm|ca|manma̍Biriti̍ manma# - Biḥ||Eti|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: akṣannamImadanta̍ hyava# priyA adhUṣata|astO̍ṣata̍ svaBAnavO̍ viprA naviṣṭhayA̍ matI|yOjA nvindra̍ tE harI̱||akṣan̍ pitarO&mImadanta̍ pitarO&tItRupanta̍ pitarO&mImRujanta̍ pitaraḥ||parE̍ta̍ pitaraḥ sOmyA gaMBIraiḥ pathiBiḥ̍ pUrvyaiḥ|athA# pitRunth suvidatrAṃq̍ apIta̍ yamEna yE sadhamAdaM̍ madanti||manO̍ nvA huvAmahE̍ nArAśaṃqsEna stOmEna̍ pitRuṇAM ca manmaBiḥ||A̍ - [ ] 8

verses.padam: (Padam) na|Etu|manaḥ|puna̍ḥ|kratvE̱|dakṣA̍ya|jIvasE̱||jyOk|ca|sUrya̱m|dRuśE||puna̍ḥ|naḥ|pitara̍ḥ|mana̍ḥ|dadA̍tu|daivya̍ḥ|jana̍ḥ||jIvam|vrAta̱m|sacEmahi||yat|antari̍kṣam|pRuthivIm|uta|dyAm|yat|mAtara̱m|pitara̱m|vA|jihiṃqsima||agniḥ|mA|tasmA̱t|Ena̍saḥ|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha-patyaḥ|prEti̍|mu~jcatu|duritEti̍# duḥ - itA|yAni|cakRuma|karOtu̍|mAm|anEnasa̱m||9̍ (44) (harI-manmaBirA-catu̍ścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: na# Etu manaḥ punaḥ kratvE dakṣAya̍ jIvasE̱|jyOk ca sUryaM̍ dRuśE||punarnaḥ̍ pitarO manO dadAtu̍ daivyO janaḥ|jIvaM̍ ~MvrAtaṃ# sacEmahi||yadantarikṣaM̍ pRuthivImuta dyAM ~MyanmAtaraM̍ pitaraM̍ ~MvA jihiṃsima|agnir mA tasmAdEnasO̍ gAṛhapatyaḥ̍ pra mu~jcatu̍ duritA yAni# cakRuma karOtu mA-manEnasa̱M||9̍ (harI-manmaBirA-catu̍ścatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) pratipUruṣamiti# prati-pUruṣam|EkakapAlAnityEka̍-kapAlAn|niriti̍|vapati|Eka̱m|ati̍riktamityati̍-riktam|yAva̍ntaḥ|gRuhyA̱ḥ|smaḥ|tEBya̍ḥ|kam|akaram|paśUnAm|śarma̍|asi|śarma̍|yaja̍mAnasya|śarma̍|mE|yacCa|Eka̍ḥ|Eva|rudraḥ|na|dvitIyA̍ya|tasthE|AKuḥ|tE|rudra|paśuḥ|tam|juṣasva|Eṣaḥ|tE|rudra|BAgaḥ|saha|svasrA̱|abiM̍kayA|tam|juṣasva|BEṣajam|gavE̱|aśvA̍ya|puru̍ṣAya|BEṣajam|athO̍ iti|asmaByamityasma-Byam|BEṣajam|suBE̍ṣajamiti̍ su - BEṣajam|10 (50)
verses.samhita: pratipUruṣamEkakapAlAn̍ nirvapatyEka-mati̍riktaM̍ ~MyAvantO̍ gRuhyA̱ḥ smastEByaḥ kamakaraM̍ paśUnAṃ śarmAsi̍ śarma yajamAnasya̍ śarma# mE yacCaika# Eva rudrO na dvitIyAya̍ tastha AKustE# rudra paśustaM juṣasvaiṣa̍ tE# rudra BAgaḥ saha svasrA&MbikayA̍ taM juṣasva̍ BEṣajaM gavE&śvAya̍ puruṣAya̍ BEṣajamathO# asmaByaM̍ BEṣajaṃ suBEṣajaM̍ - [ ] 10

verses.padam: (Padam) yathA̱|asati||sugamiti̍# su-gam|mEṣAya|mEṣyai̱|avEti̍|abaMq|rudram|adimahi|avEti̍|dEvam|trya̍baMkamiti̍ tri-abaMqkam||yathA̱|naḥ|śrEyasaḥ|kara̍t|yathA̱|naḥ|vasya̍saḥ|kara̍t|yathA̱|naḥ|paśumata̍ iti# paśu - mataḥ|kara̍t|yathA̱|naḥ|vyavasAyayAditi̍# vi - avasAyayA̱t||tryabaMkamiti̍ tri - abaMqkam|yajAmahE|sugandhimiti# su-gandhim|puṣṭivad^^rdhanamiti̍# puṣṭi-vad^^rdhanam||urvArukam|iva|bandha̍nAt|mRutyOḥ|mukṣIya|mA|amRutA̱t||Eṣaḥ|tE|rudra|BAgaḥ|tam|juṣasva|tEna̍|avasEna̍|paraḥ|mUja̍vata̍ iti mUja# - vataḥ|atIti|ihi̍ ( )|avatatadhanvEtyava̍tata̍ - dhanvA|pinAkahasta̍ iti pinAka̍ - hastaḥ|kRuttivAsA̍ iti kRutti# - vAsAḥ||11 (53)
verses.samhita: ~MyathA&sati|sugaM̍ mEṣAya# mEṣyA# avA̱Mba rudra-madimahyava̍# dEvaM tyraMbakaM|yathA̍# naḥ śrEyasaḥ̍ karad yathA# nO vasyasaḥ̍ karad yathA# naḥ paśumataḥ karad yathA# nO vyavasAyayA̱t||tyraMbakaM̍ ~MyajAmahE sugandhiM puṣṭivarddha̍naM|urvAruka-mi̍va̍ bandhanAn̍ mRutyOr mukṣIya̍ mA&mRutA̱t||Eṣa tE# rudra BAgastaM juṣasva̍ tEnAvasEna̍# parO mUjavatO&tIhya̍ ( ) vatatadhanvA̍ pinAkahastaḥ̍ kRuttivAsAḥ||11̍

verses.padam: (Padam) aindrAgnamityai̱ndra - agnam|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva-dEvam|carum|indrAya|śunAsIrA̍ya|purOḍAśa̱m|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|vAyavya̱m|payaḥ|sauryam|Eka̍kapAlamityEka̍# - kapAlam|dvAdaśagavamiti# dvAdaśa - gavam|sIra̱m|dakṣiṇA|AgnEyam|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapati|raudram|gAvIdhukam|carum|aindram|dadhi̍|vAruṇam|yavamayamiti̍# yava-maya̱m|carum|vahinI̱|dhEnuḥ|dakṣiṇA|yE|dEvAḥ|puraḥ̍ sada iti# puraḥ - sadaḥ|agninE̱trA̍ ityagni - nEtrAḥ|dakṣiṇasada iti# dakṣiṇa - sadaḥ|yamanE̱trA̍ iti# yama - nEtrAḥ|paścAthsada iti# paścAt - sadaḥ|savitRunE̱trA̍ iti# savitRu - nEtrAḥ|uttarasada ityuttara̍ - sadaḥ|varu̍ṇanEtrA̍ iti varuṇa̍ - nEtrAḥ|upariṣada ityupari̍ - sadaḥ|bRuhaspati̍nEtrA̍ iti bRuhaspati# - nEtrAḥ|rakṣOhaṇa iti# rakṣaḥ - hanaḥ|tE|naḥ|pAntu|tE|naḥ|avantu|tEBya̍ḥ|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aindrAgnaM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvaiśvadEvaM carumindrAya̍ śunAsIrAya̍ purOḍAśaM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvAyavyaM̍ payaḥ̍ sauryamEkakapAlaM̍ dvAdaśagavaṃ sIraM dakṣiṇA-̍ &&gnEya-maṣṭAkapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ raudraM gAvIdhukaM̍ carumaindraM dadhi# vAruṇaM ~Myavamaya̍M̍ caruM ~MvahinI# dhEnur dakṣiṇA̍ yE dEvAḥ purassadO&gninE̱trA̍ dakṣiṇasadO# yamanE̱trAḥ paścAthsadaḥ̍ savitRunE̱trA uttarasadO varuṇanEtrA̍ upariṣadO bRuhaspatinEtrA̍ rakṣOhaṇastE naḥ̍ pAntu tE nO&vantu̍ tEByO - [ ] 12

verses.padam: (Padam) namaḥ|tEBya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|samU̍ḍhamiti̍ saM - Uḍham|rakṣaḥ|saMda̍gdhamiti̍ saM-dagdham|rakṣaḥ|idam|aham|rakṣa̍ḥ|aBi|samiti̍|dahAmi|agnayE̱|rakṣOGna̍ iti# rakṣaḥ - GnE|svAhA̱|yamAya|savitrE|varu̍ṇAya|bRuhaspata̍yE|duva̍svatE|rakṣOGna̍ iti# rakṣaḥ-GnE|svAhA̱|praṣṭivAhIti# praṣṭi-vAhI|rathaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|dEvasya̍|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu-ByAm|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|rakṣasaḥ|vadham|juhOmi|hatam|rakṣa̍ḥ|ava̍dhiṣma|rakṣa̍ḥ|yat|vastE̱|tat|dakṣi̍ṇA||13̍ (45) (tEByaḥ-pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: namastEByaḥ svAhA samUḍhaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ sanda#gdhaṃq̍ rakṣa# idamahaṃ rakṣO&Bi saM dahAmyagnayE̍# rakṣOGnE svAhA# yamAya# savitrE varuṇAya̍ bRuhaspatayE̍ duvasvatE̍ rakṣOGnE svAhA̱ praṣṭivAhI rathO dakṣiṇA̍ dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasavE̱&śvinO̱r̍ bAhuByA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAṃq rakṣasO̍ vadhaM juhOmi̍ hataṃ rakṣO&vadhiṣma̍ rakṣO yad vastE tad dakṣiṇA||13̍ (tEByaḥ-pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) dhAtrE|purOḍAśa̱m|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapati|anu̍matyA̍ ityanu# - matyai|carum|rAkAyai̱|carum|sinIvAlyai|carum|kuhvai̱|carum|mithunau|gAvau̱|dakṣiṇA|AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA̍ -vaiṣṇavam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapati|aindrAvaiṣṇavamityai̱ndrA̍ - vaiṣṇavam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|vaiṣṇavam|trikapAlamiti# tri - kapAlam|vAmanaḥ|vahI|dakṣiṇA|agnIṣOmIyamitya̍gnI̍ - sOmIya̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapati|indrAsOmIyamitI̱ndrA̍ - sOmIya̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|saumyam|carum|baBruḥ|dakṣiṇA|sOmApauṣṇamiti̍# sOmA - pauṣṇam|carum|niriti|vapati|aindrApauṣṇamityai̱ndrA̍ - pauṣṇam|carum|pauṣṇam|carum|śyAmaḥ|dakṣiṇA|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa-kapAlam|niriti̍# ( )|vapati|hiraṇyam|dakṣi̍ṇA|vAruṇam|yavamayamiti̍# yava - maya̱m|carum|aśvaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA||14̍ (58)
verses.samhita: dhAtrE purOḍAśaM̍ dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapatyanu̍matyai̍ caruṃ rAkAyai# caruṃ sinIvAlyai̍ caruM kuhvai# caruM mithunau̍ gAvau dakṣiṇA̍ &&gnAvaiṣṇava-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapatyaindrAvaiṣṇava-̍ mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvaiṣṇavaM trikapAlaM̍ ~MvAmanO̍ vahI dakṣiṇA-&gnIṣOmIya-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapatIndrAsOmIya-̍ mEkAdaśakapAlaṃ̍ saumyaM caruM baBrur dakṣiṇA̍ sOmApauṣṇaM caruM nirvapatyaindrA̍ pauṣṇaM caruM pauṣṇaM caruṅ śyAmO dakṣiṇA̍ vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nir ( ) vapati̍ hiraṇyaM̍ dakṣiṇA̍ vAruṇaM ~Myavamaya̍M̍ carumaśvO dakṣiṇA||14̍

verses.padam: (Padam) bAṛqhaspatyam|carum|niriti|vapati|brahmaṇa̍ḥ|gRuhE|śitipRuṣṭha̍ iti# śiti - pRuṣṭhaḥ|dakṣiṇA|aindram|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAlam|rAjanya̍sya|gRuhE|RuṣaBaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|Adityam|carum|mahi̍ṣyai|gRuhE|dhEnuḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|naira.Rutamiti̍# naiḥ-Rutam|carum|parivRuktyA# iti# pari-vRuktyai̱|gRuhE|kRuṣṇAnA̱m|vrIhIṇAm|naKanirBinnamiti̍# naKa-nirBinnam|kRuṣṇA|kUṭA|dakṣiṇA|AgnEyam|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|sEnAnya# iti# sEnA - nyaḥ|gRuhE|hira̍ṇyam|dakṣi̍ṇA|vAruṇam|daśa̍kapAlamiti̍ daśa-kapAlam|sUtasya̍|gRuhE|mahAni̍raṣṭa̍ iti# mahA-niraṣṭaḥ|dakṣiṇA|mArutam|saptaka̍pAlamiti̍# sapta - kapAlam|grAmaṇya# iti# grAma - nyaḥ|gRuhE|pRuśni̍ḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|sAvitram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|15 (50)
verses.samhita: bArqḥaspatyaM caruM nirvapati̍ brahmaṇO# gRuhE śitipRuṣṭhO̍ dakṣiṇaindra-mEkA̍daśakapAlaṃ̍ rAjanyasya̍ gRuha RuṣaBO̍ dakṣiṇA&&dityaM̍ caruM mahiṣyai̍ gRuhE dhEnur dakṣiṇA̍ naiṛRutaM caruM parivRuktyai̍# gRuhE kRuṣṇAnA̱M ~MvrIhIṇAM naKanirBinnaM̍ kRuṣṇA kUṭA dakṣiṇA̍ &&gnEyamaṣṭAkapAlaṃ̍ sEnAnyO# gRuhE hiraṇyaM̍ dakṣiṇA̍ vAruṇaM daśakapAlaṃ̍ sUtasya# gRuhE mahAniraṣṭO̍ dakṣiṇA̍ mArutaṃ saptakapAlaM̍ grAmaṇyO# gRuhE pRuś~ja0079;qr̍ dakṣiṇA̍ sAvitraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ - [ ] 15

verses.padam: (Padam) kṣattuḥ|gRuhE|upaddhvasta ityupa̍ - dhvastaḥ|dakṣiṇA|Aśvinam|dvikapAlamiti̍# dvi - kapAlam|sa~ggrahIturiti# saM-grahItuḥ|gRuhE|savAtyAviti̍# sa - vAtyau̱|dakṣiṇA|pauṣṇam|carum|BAgaduGasyEti̍# BAga - duGasya|gRuhE|śyAmaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|raudram|gAvIdhukam|carum|akṣAvApasyEtya̍kṣa̍ - AvApasya|gRuhE|śabala̍ḥ|udvA̍ra̍ ityut - vAraḥ|dakṣiṇA|indrA̍ya|sutrAMṇa̍ iti# su - trAMṇE̱|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|prati|niriti̍|vapati|indrA̍ya|aṃqhOmuca̍ ityaṃhaḥ-mucE̱|ayam|naḥ|rAjA̱|vRutrahEti̍# vRutra-hA|rAjA̱|BUtvA|vRutram|vaddhyAt|maitrAbAṛqhaspatyamiti# maitrA-bAṛqhaspatyam|Bavati|śvEtAyai̱|śvEtavathsAyA̍ iti# śvEta-vathsAyai|dugdhE|svayamUMqrta iti# svayam-mUrtE|svayamaMqthita iti# svayaM - mathitE|AjyE̱|AśvatthE|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kṣattur gRuha upaddhvastO̍ dakṣiṇA&&śvinaM̍ dvikapAlaṃ̍ sa~ggrahItur̍ gRuhE savAtyau̍# dakṣiṇA̍ pauṣṇaM caruM BAgaduGasya̍# gRuhE śyAmO dakṣiṇA̍ raudraM gAvIdhukaM̍ carumakṣAvApasya̍# gRuhE śabala udvArO̍ dakṣiṇEndrAya̍ sutrAMṇE# purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ prati nirvapatIndrA̍yAṃhOmucE̍ &yaM nO rAjA# vRutrahA rAjA# BUtvA vRutraM ~MvaddhyAn̍ maitrAbAṛhaspatyaM Bavati̍ śvEtAyai̱ śvEtavathsAyai̍ dugdhE svayaMmUrtE̍ svayaMmathita̍ Ajya AśvatthE̍ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: (Padam) pAtrE̱|catuḥsraktAviti̍ catuḥ̍ - sraktau|svayamavapannAyA iti# svayaM-avapannAyai̱|śAKAyai|karṇAn|ca|aka̍rṇAn|ca|taṇḍulAn|vIti̍|cinuyAt|yE|karṇAḥ|saḥ|paya̍si|bAṛqhaspatyaḥ|yE|aka̍rṇAḥ|saḥ|AjyE̱|maitraḥ|svayakRuMqtEti̍# svayam - kRutA|vEdiḥ|Bavati|svayadiMqnamiti̍# svayaM - dinam|barqḥiḥ|svayakRuMqta iti# svayaM - kRutaḥ|iddhmaḥ|sA|Eva|śvEtA|śvEtavathsEti# śvEta - vathsA|dakṣiṇA||17̍ (33) (sAvitraM dvAdaśakapAla-mAśva̍tthE̍ trayastriṃśacca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: pAtrE catuḥsraktau̍ svayamavapannAyai śAKAyai̍ karṇAṅścAkarṇAṅśca̍ taṇḍulAn vi cinuyAd̍ yE karṇAḥ sa payasi̍ bAṛhaspatyO yE&karṇAḥ̍ sa AjyE# maitraḥ svayaMkRutA̍ vEdir̍ Bavati svayandiqnaM barqḥiḥ svayaMkRuta̍ iddhmaḥ saiva śvEtA śvEtavathsA̍ dakṣiṇA||17̍ (sAvitraM dvAdaśakapAla-mAśva̍tthE̍ trayastriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) agnayE̱|gRuhapataya̍ iti# gRuha - patayE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapati|kRuṣṇAnA̱m|vrIhIṇAm|sOmA̍ya|vanaspata̍yE|śyAmAkam|carum|savitrE|satyapra̍savAyEti̍# satya - prasavAya|purOḍAśa̱m|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|AśUnAm|vrIhIṇAm|rudrAya|paśupata̍ya̍ iti# paśu - patayE|gAvIdhukam|carum|bRuhaspata̍yE|vAcaḥ|pata̍yE|naivAram|carum|indrA̍ya|jyEṣṭhAya̍|purOḍAśa̱m|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|mahAvrIhIṇAmiti̍# mahA-vrIhIṇAm|mitrAya|satyAya̍|AbAMnA̱m|carum|varu̍ṇAya|dharma̍pataya̍ iti dharma - patayE|yavamayamiti# yava - maya̱m|carum|savitA|tvA|prasavAnAmiti# pra - savAnA̱m|suvatAm|agniḥ|gRuhapatInAmiti̍# gRuha - patInAm|sOmaḥ|vanaspatI̍nAm|rudraḥ|paśUnAm|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnayE# gRuhapatayE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ kRuṣṇAnA̱M vrIhIṇAṃ sOmAya̍ vanaspatayE̍ śyAmAkaM caruṃ savitrE̍ satyaprasavAya̍ purOḍAśaM dvAdaśakapAla-mAśUnAM̍ ~MvrIhIṇAṃ̍ rudrAya# paśupatayE̍ gAvIdhukaM caruM bRuhaspatayE̍ vAcaspatayE̍ naivAraM carumindrAya̍ jyEṣṭhAya# purOḍAśa-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ mahAvrIhIṇAM̍ mitrAya# satyAyA&&MbAnA̱M caruM ~MvaruṇAya̍ dharmapatayE̍ yavamayaM̍ caruṃ savitA̍ tvA̱ prasavAnAṃ# suvatAmagnir gRuhapatInAṃq̍ sOmO vanaspatInAṃ̍ rudraḥ paśUnAM̍ -[ ] 18

verses.padam: (Padam) bRuhaspatiḥ|vAcam|indra̍ḥ|jyEṣṭhAnA̱m|mitraḥ|satyAnA̱m|varu̍ṇaḥ|dharma̍patInAmiti̍ dharma# - patInAm|yE|dEvAḥ|dEvasuva iti# dEva - suvaḥ|stha|tE|imam|AmuṣyAyaṇam|anamitrAya̍|suvaddhvam|mahatE|kṣatrAya̍|mahatE|Adhi̍patyAyEtyAdhi̍-patyAya|mahatE|jAna̍rAjyAyEti̍ jAna-rAjyAya|Eṣaḥ|vaḥ|BaratAḥ|rAjA̱|sOma̍ḥ|asmAka̱m|brAhmaṇAnA̱m|rAjA̱|pratIti̍|tyat|nAma̍|rAjyam|adhAyi|svAm|tanuva̱m|varu̍ṇaḥ|aśiśrEt|śucE̱ḥ|mitrasya̍|vratyA̱ḥ|aBUma|ama̍nmahi|mahataḥ|Rutasya̍|nAma̍|sarvE̱|vrAtA̱ḥ̍ ( )|varuṇasya|aBUvann|vIti̍|mitraḥ|Evai̱ḥ|arA̍tim|atArIt|asU̍ṣudanta|yajñiyA̱ḥ|RutEna̍|vIti̍|u|tritaḥ|jarimAṇa̱m|naḥ|Anaṭ|viṣṇO̱ḥ|krama̍ḥ|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|krAntam|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|vikrA̱ntamiti̍ vi - krAntam|asi||19 (75) (paśUnAM-~MvrAtAḥ-pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A10 )
verses.samhita: bRuhaspatir̍ vAcAmindrO̱ jyEṣṭhAnA̱M mitraḥ satyAnAM ~MvaruṇO̍ dharmapatInAM̍ ~MyE dEvA̍ dEvasuvaḥ stha ta ima-mAmuṣyAyaṇa-ma̍namitrAya̍# suvaddhvaM mahatE kṣatrAya# mahata AdhipatyAya̍ mahatE jAnarAjyAyaiṣa̍ vO# BaratA rAjA sOmO&smAkaM̍ brAhmaṇAnAṃq rAjA prati tyannAma# rAjya-madhAyi̍ svAM tanuvaM ~MvaruṇO̍ aśiśrEcCucE̱r mitrasya vratyA# aBUmAmanmahi̍ mahata Rutasya nAma sarvE vrAtA ( ) varuṇasyABUvan̍ vi mitra Evai-rarAti-matArIdasU̍ṣudanta̍ yajñiyA# RutEna vyu# tritO jarimAṇa̍M̍ na Anaḍ viṣṇOḥ kramO&si̍ viṣṇOḥ̱ krAntamasi̍ viṣṇOr vikrA̱nta-masi||19 (paśUnAM-~MvrAtAḥ-pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) arthEta ityartha-ita̍ḥ|stha|apAm|pati̍ḥ|asi|vRuṣA̱|asi|Urmiḥ|vRuṣasEna̍ iti# vRuṣa-sEnaḥ|asi|vrajakṣita iti# vraja-kṣitaḥ|stha|marutA̱m|Oja̍ḥ|stha|sUrya̍varcasa̍ iti sUrya# - varcasaḥ|stha|sUryatvacasa̍ iti sUrya# - tvacasaḥ|stha|mAndA̱ḥ|stha|vAśA̱ḥ|stha|śakvarIḥ|stha|viśvaBRuta̍ iti# viśva - BRutaḥ|stha|janaBRuta̍ iti# jana- BRutaḥ|stha|agnEḥ|tEjasyA̱ḥ|stha|apAm|Oṣa̍dhInAm|rasa̍ḥ|stha|apaḥ|dEvIḥ|madhu̍matIriti̍ madhu# - matIḥ|agRuhṇann|UrjasvatIḥ|rAjasUyAyEti̍# rAja - sUyAya|citA̍nAḥ||yABi̍ḥ|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA-varuṇau|aByaṣi̍~jcannitya̍Bi-asi̍~jcann|yABi̍ḥ|indra̱m|ana̍yann|atIti̍# ( )|arAtIḥ||rAṣṭradA̍ iti# rAṣṭra-dAḥ|stha|rAṣṭram|datta|svAhA̱|rAṣṭradA iti# rAṣṭra - dAḥ|stha|rAṣṭram|amuṣmai̱|datta||20 (61)
verses.samhita: arthEtaḥ̍ sthA&pAM patirasi̍ vRuṣA̱&syUrmir vRuṣasEnO̍&si̍ vrajakṣitaḥ̍ stha marutAmOjaḥ̍ stha sUryavarcasaḥ̍ stha sUryatvacasaḥ̍ stha mAndA̱ḥ stha vAśA̱ḥ stha śakvarIḥ̍ stha viśvaBRutaḥ̍ stha janaBRutaḥ̍ sthA&gnEstEjasyA̱ḥ̍ sthA&pAmOṣadhInAṃq̍ rasaḥ̍ sthA&pO dEvIr madhumatIragRuhṇannUrja̍svatI̍ rAjasUyAya̍ citAnAḥ||yABi̍r̍ mitrAvaruṇAva-Byaṣi̍~jcanq.̍ yABi-rindramanayannatya̍ ( ) rAtIḥ||rAṣṭradAḥ̍ stha# rAṣṭraM datta̍ svAhA# rAṣṭradAḥ stha# rAṣṭramamuṣmai# datta||20

verses.padam: (Padam) dEvI̱ḥ|Apaḥ|samiti|madhu̍matIriti̍ madhu-̍ matIḥ|madhumatIBiriti̍ madhu-matIBiḥ|sRujyaddhvam|mahi̍|varca̍ḥ|kṣatriyA̍ya|vanvAnAḥ|anA̍dhRuṣṭA̍ ityanA̱-dhRuṣṭAḥ|sIdata|UrjasvatIḥ|mahi̍|varca̍ḥ|kṣatriyA̍ya|dadha̍tIḥ|ani̍BRuṣṭamityani̍-BRuṣṭam|asi|vAcaḥ|bandhu̍ḥ|tapOjA̍ iti# tapaḥ - jAḥ|sOmasya|dAtram|asi|śukrAḥ|vaḥ|śukrEṇa̍|uditi̍|punAmi|candrAḥ|candrEṇa̍|amRutA̱ḥ|amRutE̍na|svAhA̱|rAjasUyAyEti̍# rAja - sUyAya|citA̍nAḥ||sadhamAda̍ iti# sadha-mAdaḥ|dyumninI̱ḥ|Urja̍ḥ|EtAḥ|ani̍BRuṣṭA̍ ityani-BRuṣṭAḥ|apasyuvaḥ̍|vasA̍naḥ||pastyA̍su|cakrE|varu̍ṇaḥ|sadhasthamiti̍# sadha - stham|apAm|śiśuḥ|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvIrApaḥ̍ saM madhumatIr̍ madhumatIBiḥ̍ sRujyaddhvaM mahi varcaḥ̍ kṣatriyAya̍ vanvAnA anAdhRuṣṭAḥ̍ sIdatOrjasvatIrmahi̍ varcaḥ̍ kṣatriyAya̍ dadhatIrani̍BRuṣṭamasi̍ vAcO bandhustapOjAḥ̍ sOmasya̍ dAtramasi̍ śukrA vaḥ̍ śukrEṇOtpunAmi̍ candrAścandrEṇAmRutA# amRutEna̍ svAhA# rAjasUyAya̍ citAnAḥ|sadhamAdO̱̍ dyumninIrUrja# EtA aniBRuṣṭA̍ apasyuvO vasAnaḥ||pastyA̍su̍ cakrE varuṇaḥ̍ sadhasthamapAṃ̍ śiśur̍ - [ ] 21

verses.padam: (Padam) mAtRutamAsviti̍# mAtRu - tamAsu|antaḥ||kṣatrasya|ulba̱m|asi|kṣatrasya̍|yOni̍ḥ|asi|Avi̍nnaḥ|agniḥ|gRuhapa̍tiriti̍# gRuha-patiḥ|Avinnaḥ|indra̍ḥ|vRuddhaśra̍vA̍ iti# vRuddha-śravAḥ|Avinnaḥ|pUṣA|viśvavE̍dA̍ iti# viśva - vEdAḥ|Avinnau|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|RutAvRudhAvityRu̍ta-vRudhau̱|Avi̍nnE̍ iti|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|dhRutavratE̍ iti# dhRuta - vratE|AvinnA|dEvI|adi̍tiḥ|viśvarUpIti̍# viśva-rUpI|Avinnaḥ|ayam|asau|AmuṣyAyaṇaḥ|asyAm|viśi|asminn|rAṣṭrE|mahatE|kṣatrAya̍|mahatE|Adhi̍patyAyEtyAdhi̍-patyAya|mahatE|jAna̍rAjyAyEti̍ jAna-rAjyAya|Eṣaḥ|vaḥ|BaratAḥ|rAjA̱|sOma̍ḥ|asmAka̱m|brAhmaṇAnA̱m|rAjA̱|indra̍sya|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mAtRutamAsvantaḥ||kṣatrasyOlba̍masi̍ kṣatrasya yOnirasyAvi̍nnO̍ agnir gRuhapatirAvi̍nna̍ indrO# vRuddhaśravA̍ Avinnaḥ̍ pUṣA viśvavEdA̍ Avinnau̍ mitrAvaruṇA̍ vRutAvRudhAvAvinnE̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ dhRutavratE̍ AvinnA̍ dEvyaditir̍ viśvarUpyAvinnO̍ &yamasAvAmuṣyAyaṇO̱&syAM̍ ~Mviśyasmin̍ rAṣṭrE mahatE̍ kṣatrAya# mahata AdhipatyAya̍ mahatE jAnarAjyAyaiṣa̍ vO# BaratA rAjA sOmO&smAkaM̍ brAhmaṇAnAṃq rAjEndrasya-̍ [ ] 22

verses.padam: (Padam) vajraḥ|asi|vArtra̍Gna̍ iti vArtra# - Gnaḥ|tvayA̱|ayam|vRutram|vaddhyAt|śatrubAdhanA̍ iti# śatru-bAdhanAḥ|stha|pAta|mA|pratya~jca̱m|pAta|mA|tirya~jca̱m|anva~jca̱m|mA|pAta|digBya̍ iti# dik-Byaḥ|mA|pAta|viśvA̱Byaḥ|mA|nAṣṭrAByaḥ|pAta|hira̍ṇyavarṇAviti̍ hiraṇya̍ - varṇau|uṣasA̱m|virOka iti# vi - rOkE|ayaḥ̍ sthUṇAviyayaḥ̍ - sthUṇau|uditAviyut̍ - itau|sUryasya|Eti̍|rOhatam|varuṇa|mitra|garta̱m|tata̍ḥ|cakṣAthAm|adi̍tim|diti̱m|ca||23̍ (41) (śiśu-rindrasyai-kacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: vajrO&si̍ vArtraGnastvayA̍ yaM ~MvRutraM ~MvaddhyAcCatrubAdha̍nAḥ̍ stha pAta mA̱ pratya~jcaM̍ pAta mA# tirya~jcamanva~jca̍M̍ mA pAta digByO mA# pAta viśvA̱ByO mA nAṣṭrAByaḥ̍ pAta hiraṇyavarṇA-vuṣasA̱M̍ ~MvirOkE&yaḥsthUṇA-vudi̍tau̍ sUryasyA&& rOhataM̍ ~Mvaruṇa mitra gartaM tataścakṣAthAmadi̍tiM̍ ditiM̍ ca||23 (śiśu-rindrasyai-kacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) samidhamiti# saM-idha̱m|Eti|tiṣṭha|gAyatrI|tvA|Canda̍sAm|avatu|trivRuditi̍# tri-vRut|stOmaḥ|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM-taram|sAma|agniḥ|dEvatA̱|brahma̍|dravi̍ṇam|ugrAm|Eti̍|tiṣṭha|triṣṭup|tvA|Canda̍sAm|avatu|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca-daśaḥ|stOmaḥ|bRuhat|sAma̍|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|kṣatram|dravi̍ṇam|virAjamiti̍# vi-rAja̱m|Eti|tiṣṭha|jaga̍tI|tvA|Canda̍sAm|avatu|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta-daśaḥ|stOmaḥ|vairUpam|sAma̍|maruta̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|viṭ|dravi̍ṇam|udI̍cIm|Eti̍|tiṣṭha|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|tvA|24 (50)
verses.samhita: samidhamA tiṣṭha̍ gAyatrI tvA CandasAmavatu̍ trivRuthstOmO# rathantaraṃ sAmAgnir dEvatA brahma draviṇamugrAmA̍ tiṣṭha̍ triṣṭup tvA CandasAmavatu̍ pa~jcadaśaḥ stOmO# bRuhath sAmEndrO# dEvatA̱ kṣatraM draviṇaM̍ ~MvirAjamA tiṣṭha̍ jagatI̍ tvA CandasAmavatu̍ saptadaśaḥ stOmO# vairUpaṃ sAma# marutO# dEvatA viḍ draviṇa-mudI̍cImA-ti̍ṣṭhAnuṣṭup̍ tvA - [ ] 24

verses.padam: (Padam) CandasAm|avatu|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka-viṃqśaḥ|stOma̍ḥ|vairAjam|sAma̍|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|dEvatA̱|bala̱m|dravi̍ṇam|Ud^^rdhvAm|Eti̍|tiṣṭha|pa~gktiḥ|tvA|Canda̍sAm|avatu|triṇavatrayastriṃqśAviti̍# triṇava - trayastriṃqśau|stOmau̱|śAkvararaivatE iti# śAkvara-raivatE|sAmanI̍ iti|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|varca̍ḥ|dravi̍ṇam|IdRu~g|ca|anyAdRu~g|ca|EtAdRu~g|ca|pratidRu~giti̍# prati - dRu~g|ca|mitaḥ|ca|saMmita̍ iti saM - mitaḥ|ca|saBarA̍ iti sa - BarAḥ||śukrajyOtiriti̍# śukra - jyOtiḥ|ca|citrajyOtiriti̍# citra - jyOtiḥ|ca|satyajyOtiriti̍# satya - jyOtiḥ|ca|jyOtiṣmAn|ca|satyaḥ|ca|RutapA̍ ityRuta̍ - pAḥ|ca|25 (50)
verses.samhita: CandasA-mavatvEkaviṃqśaḥ̍ stOmO# vairAjaṃ sAma# mitrAvaruṇau̍ dEvatA balaM draviṇa-mUrddhvAmA̍ tiṣṭha̍ pa~gktistvA CandasAmavatu̍ triṇavatrayastriṃqśau stOmau# śAkvararaivatE sAmanI̍ bRuhaspatir̍ dEvatA varcO draviṇa-mIdRu~g̍ cA̱nyAdRu~g caitAdRu~g̍ ca# pratidRu~g ca# mitaśca saMmitaśca̍ saBarAḥ|śukrajyO̍tiśca̍ citrajyOtiśca̍ satyajyOtiśca̍ jyOtiṣmAṅśca̍ satyaścartapAścA̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: (Padam) atyaṃhA̍ ityati-aṃqhAḥ||agnayE̱|svAhA̱|sOmA̍ya|svAhA̱|savitrE|svAhA̱|sara̍svatyai|svAhA̱|pUṣṇE|svAhA̱|bRuhaspata̍yE|svAhA̱|indrA̍ya|svAhA̱|GOṣA̍ya|svAhA̱|ślOkA̍ya|svAhA̱|aṃśA̍ya|svAhA̱|BagA̍ya|svAhA̱|kṣEtra̍sya|pata̍yE|svAhA̱|pRuthivyai|svAhA̱|antari̍kṣAya|svAhA̱|divE|svAhA̱|sUryA̍ya|svAhA̱|candrama̍sE|svAhA̱|nakṣa̍trEByaḥ|svAhA̱|adBya̍ ityat-Byaḥ|svAhA̱|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi-Byaḥ|svAhA̱|vanaspati̍Bya̍ iti vanaspati-Byaḥ|svAhA̱|carAcarEBya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|pariplavEBya̍ iti# pari - plavEByaḥ|svAhA̱|sarIsRupEBya̍ḥ|svAhA̱̍ ( )||26 (50)
verses.samhita: &tyaṃhAḥ|agnayE̍ svAhA sOmAya̍ svAhA# savitrE svAhA sarasvatyai̍ svAhA# pUṣṇE svAhA bRuhaspatayE̍ svAhEndrAya̍ svAhA GOṣAya̍ svAhA ślOkAya̍ svAhA &ṃśAya̍ svAhA BagAya̍ svAhA kṣEtrasya̍ patayE̍ svAhA# pRuthivyai svAhA &ntarikṣAya̍ svAhA# divE svAhA sUryAya̍ svAhA# candramasE̍ svAhA nakṣatrEByaḥ̍ svAhA &dByaḥ svAhauṣadhIByaḥ̍ svAhA vanaspatiByaḥ̍ svAhA# carAcarEByaḥ svAhA# pariplavEByaḥ svAhA# sarIsRupEByaḥ svAhA̱||26

verses.padam: (Padam) sOmasya|tviṣi̍ḥ|asi|tava̍|iva|mE|tviṣi̍ḥ|BUyAt|amRuta̱m|asi|mRutyOḥ|mA|pAhi|didyOt|mA|pAhi|avE̱ṣṭA̍ ityava-iṣṭAḥ|dandaśUkA̱ḥ|nira̍stamiti̍ niḥ-astam|namucEḥ|śira̍ḥ||sOma̍ḥ|rAjA̱|varu̍ṇaḥ|dEvAḥ|dharmasuva̍ iti# dharma -suvaḥ|ca|yE||tE|tE|vAca̱m|suvantAm|tE|tE|prAṇamiti̍# pra-anam|suvantAm|tE|tE|cakṣuḥ|suvantAm|tE|tE|śrOtra̱m|suvantAm|sOma̍sya|tvA|dyumnEna̍|aBIti̍|si~jcAmi|agnEḥ|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sOmasya̍ tviṣirasi̍ tavEva̍ mE tviṣir̍ BUyAdamRutamasi̍ mRutyOr mA# pAhi didyOnmA# pAhyavE̱ṣṭA dandaśUkA nirastaM̍ namucEḥ̍ śiraḥ||sOmO̍ rAjA varuṇO̍ dEvA dharmasuva̍śca̍ yE|tE tE vAcaṃ# suvantAM tE tE̱ prAṇaṃ suvantAM̍ tE tE cakṣuḥ̍ suvantAM tE tE śrOtraṃ# suvantAṃq sOmasya̍ tvA dyumnEnABi ṣi~jcAmyagnE̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: (Padam) tEjasA|sUrya̍sya|varca̍sA|indra̍sya|indriyEṇa̍|mitrAvaru̍ṇayOriti̍# mitrA - varuṇayOḥ|vIryE̍ṇa|marutA̱m|Oja̍sA|kṣatrAṇA̱m|kṣatrapa̍tiriti̍# kṣatra - patiḥ|asi|atIti|divaḥ|pAhi|samAva̍vRutranniti̍# saM - AvavRutrann|adharAk|udI̍cIḥ|ahi̱m|buddhniya̱m|anviti̍#|sa~jcara̍ntIriti̍# saM-carantIḥ|tAḥ|parva̍tasya|vRuṣaBasya̍|pRuṣṭhE|nAva̍ḥ|caranti|svasica̍ iti# sva-sicaḥ|iyAnAḥ||rudra̍|yat|tE|krayi̍|para̱m|nAma̍|tasmai̱|hutam|asi|yamEṣṭamiti̍# yama - iṣṭam|asi||prajApata̍ iti prajA̱-patE|na|tvat|EtAni|anyaḥ|viśvA̱|jAtAni̍|parIti̍|tA̍ ( )|baBUva||yatkAmA̍ iti yat - kAmAḥ|tE|juhumaḥ|tat|naḥ|astu|vayam|syAma|patayaḥ|rayIṇAm||28̍ (61)
verses.samhita: stEjasA̍ sUryasya̍ varcasEndrasyEndriyEṇa̍# mitrAvaruṇayOr̍ vIryEṇa̍ marutAmOjasA̍ kṣatrAṇA̱M kṣatrapatirasyati̍# divaspAhi̍ samAvavRutranna-dharAgudI̍cI-rahi̍M̍ buddhniyamanu# sa~jcarantIstAḥ̍ parvatasya̍ vRuṣaBasya# pRuṣṭhE nAvaścaranti̍ svasica# iyAnAḥ||rudra yattE krayI paraM nAma tasmai# hutamasi̍ yamEṣṭamasi|prajA̍patE̍ na tvadEtAnyanyO viśvA# jAtAni pari tA ( ) baBUva|yatkA̍mAstE̍ juhumastannO# astu vayaṅ syAma̍ patayO̍ rayIṇAM||28

verses.padam: (Padam) indrasya|vajra̍ḥ|asi|vArtra̍Gna̍ iti vArtra-Gnaḥ|tvayA̱|ayam|vRutram|vaddhyAt|mitrAvaru̍ṇayOriti̍# mitrA - varuṇayOḥ|tvA|praśAstrOriti̍# pra-śAstrOḥ|praśiṣEti# pra -śiṣA̱|yunajmi|yajñasya|yOgE̍na|viṣṇO̱ḥ|krama̍ḥ|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|krAntam|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|vikrA̱ntamiti̍ vi - krAntam|asi|marutA̱m|prasava iti# pra - savE|jEṣam|Aptam|manaḥ|samiti̍|aham|indriyEṇa̍|vIryE̍ṇa|paśUnAm|manyuḥ|asi|tava̍|iva|mE|manyuḥ|BUyAt|nama̍ḥ|mAtrE|pRuthivyai|mA|aham|mAtara̱m|pRuthivIm|hiṃqsiṣam|mA|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrasya̍ vajrO&si̍ vArtraGnastvayA&yaM̍ ~MvRutraM ~MvaddhyAn̍ mitrAvaruṇayOstvA̍ praśAstrOḥ praśiṣA# yunajmi yajñasya yOgEna̍ viṣṇOḥ kramO&si̍ viṣṇO̱ḥ krAntamasi̍ viṣṇOr vikrA̱ntamasi marutA̱M prasavE jEṣamAptaM̍ manaḥ samahamindriyEṇa̍# vIryEṇa̍ paśUnAM manyurasi̍ tavEva̍ mE manyur BUyAnnamO̍# mAtrE pRuthivyai̍ mA&haM mAtaraM̍ pRuthivIṃ hiṃsiṣaM̍ mA - [ ] 29

verses.padam: (Padam) mAm|mAtA|pRuthivI|hiṃqsIt|iyat|asi|Ayu̍ḥ|asi|Ayu̍ḥ|mE|dhEhi|Urk|asi|Urja̱m|mE|dhEhi|yu~g|asi|varca̍ḥ|asi|varca̍ḥ|mayi̍|dhEhi|agnayE̱|gRuhapa̍taya̍ iti# gRuha-patayE|svAhA̱|sOmAya|vanaspata̍yE|svAhA̱|indra̍sya|balA̍ya|svAhA̱|marutA̱m|Oja̍sE|svAhA̱|haṃqsaḥ|śuciṣaditi̍# śuci - sat|vasuḥ|antarikṣaditya̍ntarikṣa̍ - sat|hOtA̱|vEdiṣaditi# vEdi - sat|atithiḥ|durOṇasaditi̍# durOṇa - sat||nRuṣaditi# nRu - sat|varasaditi# vara - sat|RutasadityRuta̍ -sat|vyOmasaditi# vyOma - sat|abjA ityap̍ - jAḥ|gOjA iti# gO - jAḥ|RutajA ityRuta-jAḥ̍ ( )|adrijA ityadri̍ - jAḥ|RutaM|bRuhat||30 (53) (hiṃqsiṣaM ma-rtajA-strIṇi# ca) (A15)
verses.samhita: mAM mAtA pRuthivI̍ hiṃsIdiya̍dasyAyu̍-rasyAyu̍r̍ mE dhEhyUrgasyUrjaM̍ mE dhEhi yu~g~gasi̍ varcO&si̍ varcO mayi# dhEhyagnayE# gRuhapatayE̍ svAhA sOmAya̍ vanaspatayE̍ svAhEndrasya̍ balAya̍ svAhA# marutAmOjasE̍ svAhA# haṃqsaḥ śuciṣad̍ vasurantarikṣa̍ -saddhOtA# vEdiṣadatithir̍ durOṇasat|nRuṣad varasadRu̍tasad̍ vyOmasadabjA̍ gOjA RutajA̍ ( ) adrijA̍ RutaM bRuhat||30

verses.padam: (Padam) mitraḥ|asi|varuṇaḥ|asi|samiti̍|aham|viśvai̱ḥ|dEvaiḥ|kṣatrasya̍|nABi̍ḥ|asi|kṣatrasya̍|yOni̍ḥ|asi|syOnAm|Eti̍|sIda|suṣadAmiti̍# su - sadA̱m|Eti|sIda|mA|tvA|hiṃqsIt|mA|mA|hiṃqsIt|nIti̍|sasAda|dhRutavra̍ta̍ iti# dhRuta - vrataḥ|varuṇaḥ|pastyA̍su|Eti̍|sAmrA̱jyAyEti̍ sAM-rAjyAya|sukraturiti# su- kratuḥ|brahmA(3)n|tvam|rAjann|brahmA|asi|savitA|asi|satyasa̍va̍ iti# satya - savaḥ|brahmA(3)n|tvam|rAjann|brahmA|asi|indraḥ|asi|satyaujA̍ iti# satya - OjAḥ|31 (50)
verses.samhita: mitrO&si̍ varuṇO&si̍ samahaM ~Mviśvai̱r dEvaiḥ kṣatrasya nABirasi̍ kṣatrasya yOnirasi̍ syOnAmA sIda̍ suṣadAmA sIda̍ mA tvA# hiṃsInmA mA# hiṃsInni ṣasAda̍ dhRutavratO̍ varuṇaḥ̍ pastyA̱svA sAmrA̱jyAya sukratur brahmA(3)n tvaṃ rAjan̍ brahmA&si# savitA&si# satyasavO̍ brahmA(3)n tvaṃ rAjan̍ brahmA&sIndrO&si̍ satyaujA - [ ] 31

verses.padam: (Padam) brahmA(3)n|tvam|rAjann|brahmA|asi|mitraḥ|asi|suśEva iti# su - śEvaḥ|brahmA(3)n|tvam|rAjann|brahmA|asi|varu̍ṇaḥ|asi|satyadharmEti̍# satya - dharmA|indrasya|vajra̍ḥ|asi|vArtra̍Gna̍ iti vArtra# - Gnaḥ|tEna|mE|raddhya|diśa̍ḥ|aBIti̍|ayam|rAjA̱|aBUt|suślOkA~M(4)̍ iti su - ślOkA~M(4)|suma~ggalA~M(4)̍ iti su - ma~ggalA~M(4)|satyarAjA(3)niti̍ satya# - rAjA(3)n||apAm|naptrE̱|svAhA̱|Urjaḥ|naptrE̱|svAhA̱|agnayE̱|gRuhapataya̍ iti# gRuha - patayE|svAhA̱||32 (40) (satyaujA̱-ścatvAriṃqśacca# ) (A16)
verses.samhita: brahmA(3)n tvaṃ rAjan̍ brahmA&si# mitrO&si̍ suśEvO brahmA(3)n tvaṃ rAjan̍ brahmA&si varuṇO&si̍ satyadharmEndrasya̍ vajrO&si̍ vArtraGnastEna̍# mE raddhya diśO&Byayaṃ̍ rAjA&BUth̍ suślOkA~M(4) suma~ggalA~M(4)̍ satyarAjA(3)n|apAM̍ naptrE svAhOrjO naptrE svAhA&gnayE# gRuhapatayE̍ svAhA̱||32 (satyaujA̱-ścatvAriṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) AgnEyam|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA-kapAlam|niriti̍|vapati|hira̍ṇyam|dakṣi̍ṇA|sArasvatam|carum|vathsatarI|dakṣi̍ṇA|sAvitram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|upaddhvasta ityupa̍ - dhvastaḥ|dakṣiṇA|pauṣṇam|carum|śyAmaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|bAṛqhaspatyam|carum|śitipRuṣṭha̍ iti# śiti - pRuṣṭhaḥ|dakṣiṇA|aindram|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAlam|RuṣaBaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|vAruṇam|daśa̍kapAlamiti̍ daśa# - kapAlam|mahAniraṣṭa̍ iti# mahA-niraṣṭaḥ|dakṣiṇA|saumyam|carum|baBruḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|tvAṣṭram|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|śuṇṭhaḥ|dakṣiṇA|vaiṣṇavam|trikapAlamiti̍# tri - kapAlam|vAmanaḥ|dakṣiṇA||33̍ (42) (AgnEyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ̍ sArasvataM-dvicatvAriṃśat̍ )(A17)
verses.samhita: AgnEyamaṣṭAkapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ hiraṇyaM̍ dakṣiṇA̍ sArasvataM caruM ~MvathsatarI̍ dakṣiṇA̍ sAvitraM dvAdaśakapAla-mupaddhvastO̍ dakṣiṇA̍ pauṣṇaM caruṅ śyAmO dakṣiṇA̍ bAṛhaspatyaM caruṃ śitipRuṣṭhO̍ dakṣiṇaindra-mEkA̍daśakapAla-mRuṣaBO̍ dakṣiṇA̍ vAruṇaM daśakapAlaM̍ mahAniraṣṭO̍ dakṣiṇA̍ saumyaM caruM baBrur dakṣiṇA̍ tvAṣṭramaṣṭAkapAlaṃ̍ śuṇṭhO dakṣiṇA̍ vaiṣṇavaM trikapAlaM̍ vAmanO̍ dakṣiṇA||33̍

verses.padam: (Padam) sadyaḥ|dIkṣayanti|sadyaḥ|sOma̱m|krIṇanti|puṇḍarisrajAm|prEti|yacCati|daśaBiriti̍# daśa-Biḥ|vathsataraiḥ|sOma̱m|krIṇAti|daśapEya iti# daśa-pEyaḥ|Bavati|śatam|brAhmaṇAḥ|pibanti|saptadaśamiti̍# sapta - daśam|stOtram|Bavati|prAkAśau|addhvaryavE̱|dadAti|sraja̱m|udgAtra ityut-gAtrE|rukmam|hOtrE̱|aśva̱m|prastOtRupratihartRuByAmiti̍# prastOtRupratihartRu-ByAM|dvAdaśa|paṣṭhauhIḥ|brahmaṇE̱|vaśAm|maitrAvaruṇAyEti̍# maitrA - varuṇAya|RuṣaBam|brAhmaṇAcCaṃqsinE̱|vAsa̍sI̍ iti|nEṣṭApOtRuByAmiti̍# nEṣṭApOtRu - ByAm|sthUri|yavAcitamiti̍# yava - Acitam|acCAvAkAya|anaḍvAha̱m|agnIdha̍ ityagni̍ - idhE̱|BArgavaḥ|hOtA̱|Bavati|śrAyantIya̱m|brahmasAmamiti# brahma - sAmam|Bavati|vAravantIyamiti# vAra - vantIya̱m ( )|agniṣṭOmasAmamityagniṣṭOma̍ - sAmam|sArasvatIḥ|apaḥ|gRuhṇAti||34 (54)
verses.samhita: sadyO dI̱kṣayanti sadyaḥ sOmaM̍ krIṇanti puṇḍarisrajAM pra yacCati̍ daśaBir̍ vathsataraiḥ sOmaM̍ krIṇAti daśapEyO# Bavati śataM brA̱hmaṇAḥ pibanti̍ saptadaśaṅ stOtraM Bavati̍ prAkAśAvaddhvaryavE̍# dadAti sraja-mudgAtrE̍ rukmaṃ hOtrE&śvaM̍ prastOtRupratihartRuByAM dvAdaśa̍ paṣṭhauhIr brahmaṇE# vaśAM mai̱trAvaruṇAyaṛṣaBaM̍ brA̱hmaṇAcCaṃqsinE vAsasI̍ nEṣṭApOtRuByAṅq sthUri# yavAcita-macCAvAkAyA̍naḍvAha̍-magnIdhE̍# BArgavO hOtA# Bavati śrAyantIyaM̍ brahmasAmaM Bavati̍ vAravantIya# ( ) magniṣṭOmasAmaṃ sArasvatI-rapO̍ gRuhṇAti||34̍

verses.padam: (Padam) AgnEyam|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA-kapAlam|niriti̍|vapati|hira̍ṇyam|dakṣi̍ṇA|aindram|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAlam|RuṣaBaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva-dEvam|carum|piśa~ggI̱|paṣṭauhI|dakṣiṇA|maitrAvaruṇImiti̍# maitrA-varuṇIm|AmikṣA̱m|vaśA|dakṣiṇA|bAṛqhaspatyam|carum|śitipRuṣṭha̍ iti# śiti-pRuṣṭhaḥ|dakṣiṇA|AdityAm|malqḥAm|garBiṇI̱m|Eti̍|laBatE|mArutIm|pRuśni̱m|paṣṭhauhIm|aśviByAmityaśvi-ByAm|pUṣṇE|purOḍAśa̱m|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapati|sara̍svatE|satyavAca̍ iti# satya - vAcE̱|carum|savitrE|satyaprasavAyEti̍# satya - prasavAya|purOḍAśa̱m|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|tisRudhanvamiti# tisRu - dhanvam|śuṣkadRutiriti# śuṣka - dRutiḥ|dakṣiṇA||35̍ (47) (agnEyaṃ hiraṇyamaidramRu̍ṣaBO̍ vai̱śvadEvaM piśa~ggI# bAṛhaspatyaṃ-saptacatvAriṃśat)̍ (A19)
verses.samhita: AgnEya-maṣṭAkapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ hiraṇyaM̍ dakṣiṇaindra-mEkA̍daśakapAla-mRuṣaBO̍ dakṣiṇA̍ vaiśvadEvaM caruM piśa~ggI# paṣṭhauhI dakṣiṇA̍ maitrAvaruṇI-mAmikṣA̱M ~MvaśA dakṣiṇA̍ bAṛhaspatyaM caruṃ śitipRuṣṭhO̍ dakṣiṇA&&dityAM̍ malqḥAM garBiṇImA laBatE̍ mArutIM pRuś~ja0079;̍M̍ paṣṭhauhI-maśviByA̱M pUṣṇE purOḍAśaM̍ dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ sarasvatE̍ satyavAcE# caruṃ savitrE̍ satyaprasavAya̍ purOḍAśaM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ tisRudhanvaṃ śuṣkadRutir̍ dakṣiṇA||35̍ (agnEyaṃ hiraṇyamaidramRu̍ṣaBO̍ vai̱śvadEvaM piśa~ggI# bAṛhaspatyaṃ-saptacatvAriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) AgnEyam|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA-kapAlam|niriti̍|vapati|saumyam|carum|sAvitram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa-kapAlam|bAṛqhaspatyam|carum|tvAṣṭram|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|vaiśvAnaram|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|dakṣiṇaḥ|rathavAhanavAha̍ iti# rathavAhana-vAhaḥ|dakṣiṇA|sArasvatam|carum|niriti̍|vapati|pauṣṇam|carum|maitram|carum|vAruṇam|carum|kṣaitrapatyamiti̍# kṣaitra - patyam|carum|Adityam|carum|uttara̍ ityut - taraḥ|rathavAhanavAha iti# rathavAhana - vAhaḥ|dakṣiṇA||36̍ (34) (AgnEyaṃ saumyaM bAṛhaspatyaM-catu̍striṃśat)̍ (A20)
verses.samhita: AgnEya-maṣṭAkapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ saumyaM caruṃ sAvitraM̍ dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ bAṛhaspatyaM caruM tvAṣṭramaṣṭAkapAlaM̍ ~MvaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ dakṣiṇO̍ rathavAhanavAhO dakṣiṇA̍ sArasvataM caruM nirvapati̍ pauṣṇaM caruM maitraM caruM ~MvAruṇaM̍ caruM kṣai̱trapatyaM carumAdityaM̍ carumuttarO̍ rathavAhanavAhO dakṣiṇA||36̍ (AgnEyaṃ saumyaM bAṛhaspatyaM-catu̍striṃśat)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) svAdvIm|tvA|svAdunA̱|tIvrAm|tIvrEṇa|amRutA̱m|amRutE̍na|sRujAmi̍|samiti̍|sOmE̍na|sOma̍ḥ|asi|aśviByAmityaśvi-ByAm|pacyasva|sara̍svatyai|pacyasva|indrA̍ya|sutrAMṇa̍ iti# su - trAMṇE̱|pacyasva|punAtu|tE|parisrutamiti̍# pari - sruta̱m|sOma̱m|sUryasya|duhitA||vArE̍ṇa|śaśva̍tA|tanA̱||vAyuḥ|pUtaḥ|pavitrE̍ṇa|pratya~g|sOma̍ḥ|ati̍druta̍ ityati-drutaḥ||indra̍sya|yujya̍ḥ|saKA̱||kuvit|a~gga|yava̍manta̍ iti yava-mantaḥ|yava̱m|cit|yathA̱|dAnti̍|anupUrvamitya̍nu̍ - pUrvam|viyUyEti# vi - yUya||ihEhEtIha̍ - iha|EṣAm|kRuṇuta|BOjanAni̍ ( )|yE|barqḥiṣaḥ|namO̍vRuktimiti̍ namaḥ̍ - vRuktim|na|jagmuḥ||Aśvinam|dhUmram|Eti|laBatE|sArasvatam|mEṣam|aindram|RuṣaBam|aindram|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAlam|niriti̍|vapati|sAvitram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|vAruṇam|daśakapAlamiti̍ daśa# - kapAlam|sOmapratIkA̍ iti sOma# - pratIkAḥ|pitaraḥ|tRupṇuta|vaḍabA|dakṣi̍ṇA||37̍ (76) (BOjanAni-ṣaḍviṃ̍śatiśca)̍ (A21)
verses.samhita: svAdvIM tvA̱ svAdunA# tIvrAM tIvrEṇAmRutAmamRutE̍na̍ sRujAmi saṃ sOmEna̍ sOmO̱&syaśviByA̱M pacyasva sarasvatyai̍ pacyasvEndrAya̍ sutrAMṇE# pacyasva punAtu# tE parisrutaṃq sOmaṃq sUryasya̍ duhitA|vArEṇa̍ śaśvatA̍ tanA̱||vAyuḥ pUtaḥ pavitrEṇa̍ pratya~g sOmO atidrutaḥ|indra̍sya̍ yujyaḥ saKA̱||kuvida~g yavamantO̍ yavaM̍ cid yathA dAntyanupUrvaM̍ ~MviyUya|ihEhai̍ṣAM̍ kRuṇuta BOjanAni̍ ( ) yE barqḥiṣO namOvRuktiM̍ na jagmuḥ||AśvinaM dhUmramA laBatE̍ sArasvataM mEṣamaindramRuṣaBa-maindra-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ sAvitraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvAruṇaM daśakapAlaṃq̍ sOmapratIkAḥ̍ pitarastRupṇuta vaḍabA̍ dakṣiṇA||37̍ (BOjanAni-ṣaḍviṃ̍śatiśca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) agnAviṣṇU̍ ityagnA̱ - viṣṇU|mahi|tat|vAm|mahitvamiti̍# mahi - tvam|vItam|GRutasya|guhyA̍ni|nAma̍||damE̍dama̍ iti damE̱-damE|sapta|ratnA̱|dadhAnA|pratIti̍|vAm|jihvA|GRutam|Eti̍|caraṇyEt||agnA̍viṣṇU̍ ityagnA̱-viṣṇU|mahi|dhAma̍|priyam|vAm|vIthaḥ|GRutasya̍|guhyA̱|juṣAṇA||damE̍dama̍ iti damE̱ - damE|suṣṭutIriti# su-stutIḥ|vAvRudhAnA|pratIti|vAm|jihvA|GRutam|uditi̍|caraṇyEt||prEti̍|naḥ|dEvI|sara̍svatI|vAjE̍Biḥ|vAjinI̍vatIti̍# vAjinI̱ - vatI||dhInAm|avitrI|avatu||Eti|naḥ|divaḥ|bRuhataḥ|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnAviṣṇU̍ mahi tad vA̱M mahitvaM ~MvItaM GRutasya guhyAni̍ nAma|damE̍damE̍ sapta ratnA dadhAnA̍ prati# vAM jihvA GRutamA caraṇyEt||agnA̍viṣṇU̍ mahi dhAma# priyaM ~MvA̱M ~MvIthO GRutasya guhyA# juṣAṇA|damEdamE̍ suṣṭutIr vAvRudhAnA̍ prati# vAM jihvA GRutamuccaraṇyEt||pra̍ ṇO# dEvI sarasvatI̍ vAjEBir̍ vAjinIvatI|dhInA-ma̍vityra̍vatu|A̍ nO# divO bRuhataḥ̍ - [ ] 38

verses.padam: (Padam) parvatAt|Eti̍|sara̍svatI|yajatA|gantu|yajñam||hava̱m|dEvI|jujuṣAṇA|GRutAcI̱|śagmAm|naḥ|vAca̱m|uśatI|śRuṇOtu||bRuha̍spatE|juṣasva̍|naḥ|havyAni̍|viśvadEvyEti̍# viśva-dEvya||rAsva|ratnA̍ni|dAśuṣE̱||EvA|pitrE|viśvadE̍vAyEti̍# viśva-dEvAya|vRuṣṇE̱|yajñaiḥ|vidhEma|namasA|havirBiriti̍# haviḥ - Biḥ||bRuhaspatE|suprajA̍ iti# su - prajAḥ|vIravanta̍ iti# vIra - vantaḥ|vayam|syAma|patayaḥ|rayIṇAm||bRuha̍spatE|atIti̍|yat|aryaḥ|aṛhA̱t|dyumaditi̍# dyu - mat|viBAtIti# vi - BAti|kratu̍maditi̍ kratu# - mat|janEṣu||yat|dIdaya̍t|śava̍sA|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: parvatAdA̍ sarasvatI̍ yajatA gantu̍ yajñaM|havaM̍ dEvI jujuṣAṇA̍ GRutAcI# śagmAM nO vAcamuśatI̍ śRuṇOtu||bRuha̍spatE̍ juṣasva# nO havyAni# viśvadEvya|rAsva ratnAni̍ dAśuṣE̱||EvA pitrE viśvadEvAya̍ vRuṣṇE# yajñair vidhEma̍ namasA̍ havirBiḥ|bRuha̍spatE̍ suprajA vIravantO̍ vayaṅ syAma̍ patayO̍ rayIṇAM||bRuhaspatE̍ ati yadaryO aṛhA̱d dyumad viBAti kratumajjanE̍ṣu|yad̍ dIdayacCavasa-̍ [ ] 39

verses.padam: (Padam) RutaprajAtEtyRuta-prajAta|tat|asmAsu̍|dravi̍ṇam|dhEhi|citram||Eti̍|naḥ|mitrAvaruṇEti̍# mitrA-varuṇA|GRutaiḥ|gavyUtim|ukṣatam||maddhvA̱|rajAṃ̍si|sukratU̍ iti# su-kratU||prEti|bAhavA̱|sisRutam|jIvasE̱|naḥ|Eti̍|naḥ|gavyU̍tim|ukṣatam|GRutEna̍||Eti̍|naḥ|janE̱|śravayatam|yuvAnA|śrutam|mE|mitrAvaruṇEti̍# mitrA - varuṇA|havA̱|imA||agnim|vaḥ|pUrvyam|girA|dEvam|IḍE|vasUnAm||saparyanta̍ḥ|purupriyamiti̍# puru-priyam|mitram|na|kṣEtrasAdhasamiti̍# kṣEtra - sAdhasam||makṣu|dEvava̍ta̍ iti# dEva - vataḥ|rathaḥ|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rtaprajAta tadasmAsu draviṇaM̍ dhEhi citraM||A nO# mitrAvaruṇA GRutair gavyUtimukṣataM|maddhvA̍ rajAṃsi̍ sukratU||pra bAhavA# sisRutaM jIvasE# na A nO gavyUti-mukṣataM̍ GRutEna|A̍ nO janE̱ śravayataM ~MyuvAnA śrutaM mE# mitrAvaruṇA havEmA||agniM ~Mvaḥ̍ pUrvyaM girA dEvamIḍE̍ vasUnAM|saparyanta̍ḥ̍ purupriyaM mitraM na kṣE̱trasAdhasaM||makṣU̍ dEvavatO̍ rathaḥ - [ ] 40

verses.padam: (Padam) śUraḥ|vA|pRuthsviti̍# pRut-su|kAsu|cit||dEvAnA̱m|yaḥ|it|mana̍ḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|iya̍kṣati|aBIti̍|it|aya̍jvanaḥ|Buvat||na|yajamAna|riṣyasi|na|sunvAna|na|dEvayO̍ iti# dEva-yO||asat|atra̍|suvIryamiti̍# su - vIrya̱m|uta|tyat|AśvaśviyamityA̍śu-aśvi̍yam||naki̍ḥ|tam|karma̍ṇA|naśat|na|prEti̍|yOṣat|na|yOṣati||upEti̍|kṣaranti|sindha̍vaḥ|mayOBuva̍ iti# mayaḥ - Buvaḥ|IjAnam|ca|yakṣyamA̍ṇam|ca|dhEnava̍ḥ||pRuṇanta̱m|ca|papu̍rim|ca|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śUrO# vA pRuthsu kAsu# cit|dEvAnAM ~Mya inmanO yajamAna̍ iyakṣatyaBIdaya̍jvanO̍ Buvat||na yajamAna̍ riṣyasi na sunvAna̍ na dEvayO||asadatra̍# suvIryamuta̍ tyadAśvaśviyaM||nakiṣṭaM̍ karmaṇA̍ naśanna pra yOṣanna̍ yOṣati||upa̍# kṣaranti sindhavO̍ mayOBuva# IjAnaM ca# yakṣyamAṇaM̍ ca dhEnavaḥ|pRuṇanta̍M̍ ca papuriM̍ ca - [ ] 41

verses.padam: (Padam) śravasyavaḥ|GRutasya̍|dhArA̱ḥ|upEti̍|yanti|viśvata̍ḥ||sOmA̍rudrEti̍ sOmA̱-rudrA|vIti|vRuhatam|viṣU̍cIm|amI̍vA|yA|naḥ|gaya̱m|AvivEśEtyA̱̍ - vivEśa||ArE|bAdhEthAm|niṛRu̍timiti̍ niḥ - Rutim|parAcaiḥ|kRutam|cit|Enaḥ|prEti̍|mumuktam|asmat||sOmA̍rudrEti̍ sOmA̱-rudrA|yuvam|EtAni|asmE̍ iti|viśvA̱|tanUṣu̍|BEṣajAni̍|dhattam|avEti̍|syatam|mu~jcata̱m|yat|naḥ|asti̍|tanUṣu̍|baddham|kRutam|Ena̍ḥ|asmat|sOmA̍pUṣaṇEti̍ sOmA̱ - pUṣaṇA|jananA|rayIṇAm|jana̍nA|divaḥ|jana̍nA̍ ( )|pRuthivyAḥ||jAtau|viśvasya|Buva̍nasya|gOpau|dEvAḥ|akRuṇvann|amRuta̍sya|nABi̱m||imau|dEvau|jAya̍mAnau|juṣanta|imau|tamAṃ̍si|gUhatAm|aju̍ṣṭA||AByAm|indra̍ḥ|pakvam|AmAsu̍|antaḥ|sOmApUṣaByAmiti̍# sOmApUṣa - ByAm|janat|usriyAsu||42̍ (75) (bRuhataḥ-śavasA-rathaḥ-papu̍riM̍ ca-divO jananA-pa~jca̍viṃśatiśca)̍ (A22) Prasna KOrvai with starting Padams of 1 to 22 Anuvaakams :- anumatyA-AgnEya-mai̱ndrAgna-magnayE-sOmA̍ya-pratipUruṣa-mai̱ndrAgnaM-dhAtrE̍ - bAṛhaspatya-magnayE-&rthatO-dEvI̱ḥ-samidhaṃq-sOmasyE-ndra̍sya̍ -mitra-A̱gnEyaṃ-sadya-A̱gnEyaṃ-mA̱gnEyaṅ-svAdvIM tvA-&gnAviṣṇU-dvAviṃ̍śatiḥ|)̍ KOrvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (anumatyai-yathA&sa̍ti-dEvI̍rApO-mitrO̍&si-śUrO̍# vA-dvicatvAriṃśat|)̍ First and Last Padam of Eighth Prasnam :- (anumatyA-usriyA̍su|)̍ Kanda KOrvai with starting Padams of Eight Prasnas of Kandam 1 :- (iṣa-ApO-dEvasyA-&&da̍dE-dEvAsurAḥ-saM̍ tvA-pAkayajña-manu̍matyai|)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE pada pAṭhE aṣṭamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||||iti prathamaM kAṇḍaM||
verses.samhita: śravasyavO# GRutasya dhArA upa# yanti viśvataḥ||sOmA̍rudrA̍ vi vRuhataM̍ ~MviṣUcImamI̍vA̍ yA nO gaya-mAvivEśa̍|ArE̍ bAdhEthAM̍ niṛRutiM̍ parAcaiḥ kRutaM cidEnaḥ pra mumukta-masmat||sOmA̍rudrA̍ yuva-mEtAnyasmE viśvA# tanUṣu# BEṣajAni# dhattaM|ava# syataM mu~jcataM ~MyannO asti# tanUṣu# baddhaM kRutamEnO# asmat||sOmApUṣaṇA̍ jananA̍ rayIṇAM jananA̍ divO jananA̍ ( ) pRuthivyAḥ|jAtau viśvasya̍ Buvanasya̍ gOpau dEvA akRuṇvannamRuta̍sya̍ nABi̱M||imau dEvau jAyamAnau̍ juṣantEmau tamAṃsi̍ gUhatA-majuṣṭA|AByAmindra̍ḥ̍ pakvamAmAsvantaḥ sOmApUṣaByA̱M̍ janadusriyAsu||42̍ (bRuhataḥ-śavasA-rathaḥ-papu̍riM̍ ca-divO jananA-pa~jca̍viṃśatiśca)̍ (A22) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 22 anuvAkams :- (anumatyA-AgnEya-mai̱ndrAgnamagnayE-sOmA̍ya-̍ pratipUruṣa-mai̱ndrAgnaM-dhAtrE bAṛhaspatya-magnayEr-&thatO-dEvI̱ḥ-samidhaṃq-sOmasyE-ndra̍sya̍ -mitra-A̱gnEyaṃ-sadya-A̱gnEyaṃ-mA̱gnEyaṅ-svAdvIM tvA-&gnAviṣṇU-dvAviṃ̍śatiḥ|)̍ korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (anumatyai-yathA&sa̍ti-dEvI̍rApO-mitrO̍&si-śUrO̍# vA-dvicatvAriṃśat|)̍ first and last padam of Eighth praśnam :- (anumatyA-usriyA̍su|)̍ kAnda korvai with starting padams of Eight praśnas of kAndam 1:- (iṣa-ApO-dEvasyA-&&̍ dadE-dEvAsurAḥ-saM̍ tvA-pAkayajña-manu̍matyai|)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE aṣtamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||||iti prathamaM kAṇḍaM||=======================================
